Free time is essential. In this module, you'll learn to talk about your hobbies, from painting to traveling. You'll learn verbs for creative activities and nouns for entertainment.

> [!important] **Myth Buster** "The Gloomy Slav"
> Stereotypes say Eastern Europeans are gloomy. False! Ukraine has a vibrant culture of music, dance, and festivals. From traditional **Ð²ÐµÑ‡Ð¾Ñ€Ð½Ð¸Ñ†Ñ–** (evening gatherings) to modern techno raves in Kyiv, Ukrainians know how to party and enjoy life.
